Summary: Object had a bright neon green glow, as if on fire.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving my car along Rt. 10 at night and the horizon was very clear. I had a panoramic view of the sky in front of me. There were no tall buildings and not much urban sprawl. While driving, all of a sudden straight ahead and above me in the distance, I saw a green, glowing dot in the sky, about at a 60 degree vertical angle from my eye level. The glowing neon green ball seemed to appear out of no where and falling straight downwards from the sky for about a quarter of a of second. After this brief falling motion, in mid-air, it completely stopped on the dime for about a milisecond, and then accelerated horizontally outwards at a 90 angle, faster than it had been falling downwards, so fast that it seemed to disappear. At the beginning I thought it could have been an ice cluster from a flying airplane, but when it stopped in midair and changed direction, I then knew that it was not this. I was speechless when I witnessed this, shocked, and then excited after.
